segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, holding a plate and towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water runs from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A stool is placed near the cabinets on the left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on it, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One cabinet door is open, showing the jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter by the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window above, tied to the sides.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside has bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light comes in, illuminating the whole scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everyone seems occupied with their own tasks.
segments.speaker: PAR
